body.name: Lexar 32GB (2x16GB) ARES RGB DDR4 RAM 3600MT/s CL18 Desktop Memory, Compatible with Intel XMP 2.0 and AMD Ryzen, Black (LD4BU016G-R3600GDLA)
body.merchantInfo: Ships from and sold by Coconut Cove.
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 13 hrs 19 mins
features: Delivering blazing-fast DDR4 overclocked performance to elevate your gaming experience
Full range RGB support – customize your colors and effects with a vibrant RGB light bar
Features an aluminum heat spreader and wing design for optimal heat dissipation
Customize your RGB with Lexar RGB Sync to match your build perfectly
Designed for the latest Intel XMP 2.0 and AMD Ryzen platform
body.description: Lexar ARES RGB DDR4 Desktop Memory elevates your PC with vibrant RGB lighting and next-level DDR4 performance for an elevated gaming experience. It features an aluminum heat spreader and an aggressive wing design for optimal heat dissipation keeping your motherboard and system cool even when overclocked.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Impressive performance and aesthetic appeal
reviews.reviewText: The Lexar ARES RGB 32GB (2 x 16GB) DDR4 RAM offers impressive performance and aesthetic appeal, making it a compelling choice for PC enthusiasts and gamers. With a speed of 3600MT/s, this RAM module delivers exceptional data transfer rates, contributing to smooth multitasking, faster loading times, and overall system responsiveness.The inclusion of RGB lighting adds a touch of visual flair to the RAM modules, allowing users to customize their PC build with vibrant and dynamic lighting effects. The RGB illumination is customizable through compatible software, enabling users to synchronize the lighting with other components and create stunning visual setups.In terms of performance, the Lexar ARES RGB RAM is designed to meet the demands of modern gaming, content creation, and productivity tasks. Its high-speed capabilities ensure that data-intensive applications and games can run efficiently, enhancing the overall user experience. The 32GB capacity provides ample memory for handling resource-heavy workloads and allows for seamless multitasking without experiencing slowdowns.The build quality of the RAM modules is sturdy and reliable, with heat spreaders designed to dissipate heat effectively, maintaining optimal operating temperatures during extended periods of use. This feature is especially beneficial for overclocking enthusiasts or users aiming to push their system's performance limits.Installation and compatibility with various motherboard configurations are straightforward, making it accessible for both experienced builders and beginners. The inclusion of two 16GB modules allows for dual-channel operation, maximizing memory bandwidth and further enhancing performance.Overall, the Lexar ARES RGB 32GB DDR4 RAM delivers a balance of high-speed performance, aesthetic appeal, and reliable build quality, making it an attractive option for users seeking an upgrade to their system's memory. Whether for gaming, content creation, or general computing needs, this RAM module excels in delivering a seamless and visually striking user experience.I hope this review provides valuable insight into the features and capabilities of the Lexar ARES RGB RAM. If you have any further questions or need additional information, feel free to ask!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Pretty good dual sticks of DDR 4
reviews.reviewText: I recently decided to upgrade my aging AMD AM4 system from 16gig of DDR4 3000mhz to 32gig of DDR4 3600mhz. Since these were on sale at the time I was looking and the few reviews were decent, I decided to go with these. They came to me in a typical ram style box. They installed easy and the XMP profile applied with no problem kicking the ram into their rated timings and speed. The ram has been fast and stable, my system nor games have crashed in over a month since install the ram. The RGB looks nice too if you are a fan like me.

reviews.reviewerName: high quality. does exactly what is supposed to do.fast transferring data.
reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars fast and reliable
reviews.reviewText: kudos to Lexar for this product. pair well with my 13600k intel expo. and also rgb customizable with every rgb software.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Stable Expo and XMP profiles
reviews.reviewText: I built two systems with both i9 14900 and Ryzen 7 7800X3d. This is one of few model that supports both intel XMP and AMD Expo. On both systems after first boot and looooong memory training in bios (X670E and Z790) both motherboards recognised the stics without any issues and applied profiles. Simple straightforward and fast. CL30 @6000MT/s. Also quiet fast on mem tests. RGB is also compatible with various apps. My both systems are built on Gigabyte and recognised by the Gigabyte software immediately. Happy with the purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great RAM perfect for a 7800x3D and x670e Steel Legend
reviews.reviewText: Great ram, runs at 6000mhz no issues with my setup, look nice.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great looks, janky software
reviews.reviewText: I love the style of this ram, it looks fantastic and runs as it should. Couldn't ask for more... except better software to control them easier. In my experience the colors that I set kept reverting to default. On launching Windows sometimes it would make my ram crazy colors I never set before. Fix the software and I'll recommend this product, until then it sits in a drawer in my office.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars pretty nice ram
reviews.reviewText: thanks for the fast delivery, nice rgb and speed for cheap ram 🫶🏻

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars For less than 100 usd its great

reviews.reviewerName: An absolute bang for the buck
reviews.reviewText: Instalada y puesta a punto a 6000 mhz sin ningún problema

reviews.reviewTitle: Really nice looking ram at a decent price
reviews.reviewText: Work really good, but had to increase voltage from the 1.3v to 1.35 for ram to be stable.

Tuve que comprar toda una pc para armarla, soy editor de video y necesito mucha ram a una velocidad superior, debo decir q estas ram son muy buenas para el precio q tienen y lo q tienen, no he tenido fallas, dentro de poco comprare otras 2 para incrementar la memoria aun más :)
Buon servizio di imballaggio,buon prodotto ... testeremo.👍

reviews.reviewTitle: Good Kit at very reasonable price
reviews.reviewText: No issues running this RAM at 6000mhz under AMD Expo
